TemplateConfiguration._Description: An empty Interface Builder Storyboard document for an interface.

TemplateFiles.File: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> $if$ ($ProjectType$ == XamarinIOS) <document type="com.apple.InterfaceBuilder3.CocoaTouch.Storyboard.XIB" version="3.0" toolsVersion="6211" systemVersion="14A298i" targetRuntime="iOS.CocoaTouch" propertyAccessControl="none" useAutolayout="YES" useTraitCollections="YES"> $endif$ $if$ ($ProjectType$ == TVOS) <document type="com.apple.InterfaceBuilder.AppleTV.Storyboard" version="3.0" toolsVersion="6211" systemVersion="14A298i" targetRuntime="AppleTV" propertyAccessControl="none" useAutolayout="YES" useTraitCollections="NO"> $endif$ $if$ ($ProjectType$ == WatchOSApp) <document type="com.apple.InterfaceBuilder.WatchKit.Storyboard" version="3.0" toolsVersion="6221" systemVersion="14A343f" targetRuntime="watchKit" propertyAccessControl="none" useAutolayout="YES" useTraitCollections="YES"> $endif$ $if$ ($ProjectType$ == XamarinIOSWatchApp) <document type="com.apple.InterfaceBuilder.WatchKit.Storyboard" version="3.0" toolsVersion="6221" systemVersion="14A343f" targetRuntime="watchKit" propertyAccessControl="none" useAutolayout="YES" useTraitCollections="YES"> $endif$ <dependencies> <plugIn identifier="com.apple.InterfaceBuilder.IBCocoaTouchPlugin" version="6204"/> </dependencies> <scenes/> </document>
